p: P. berghei parasites were propagated in female 6- to 8-week-old Theiler’s Original outbred mice supplied by Envigo UK. The clonal P. berghei RMgm-928 strain ( Burda et al., 2015), which expresses mCherry under the control of the hsp70 promoter throughout the life cycle, was used for all P. berghei transcriptomic data. A Hap2 knock-out P. berghei strain in the RMgm-928::mCherry background, which does not produce male gametocytes, was used as a control for FACS gating ( Howick et al., 2019). Mosquito infections were performed in two- to five-day-old Anopheles stephensi or An. coluzzii through direct feed on mice.
